name: Web blog
body:
For editing and running the server, install Python 3.5.0 https://www.python.org/downloads/
NB! Enable option "Add Python to environment variables" && "Install pip"
To install Django, at command line:
>> pip install Django==1.8.6

To run the server. At command line:
>>>cd "path_to_the_folder"
>>>python manage.py runserver

Super User
login: admin
email: admin@example.com
password: 1111
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
